attributes.action: Legislate for Private Care Home Residents to be covered by the Human Rights Legislation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present Care Home Residents are not covered by EU legislation on Human Rights. This anomaly ensures that abuse and neglect within care homes is not policed effectively.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
